channel.title: Client Help [PI]
channel.description: Is there a way to make a client run on any type of java because some people cant play my server because they cant get the newest java or they dont want to. So is there a way I can make the run.bat applicable for any java? Maybe a different code in the run.bat?

item.title: Client Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @akshayp1 akshayp1
item.description:
@akshayp1 wrote:

Is there a way to make a client run on any type of java because some people cant play my server because they cant get the newest java or they dont want to. So is there a way I can make the run.bat applicable for any java? Maybe a different code in the run.bat?
